levels.description:
When this skill is equipped: Device gives an ally Operator <@ba.vup>1</> SP every 3.5s.
ATK<@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>, and attack all blocked enemies. Device boosted to grant <@ba.vup>1</>SP every <@ba.vup>{fake_interval}</>s, but HP loss is doubled.
<@ba.rem>Gain 1 device when skill expires</>
